Directions: Use the information below to answer each question that follows.
Content: Marbles can roll down ramps at different speeds.

A classroom experiment consists of two investigations. Students roll the same marble down each of two ramps. The ramp used in Investigation 1 is 30 centimeters high; the ramp used in Investigation 2 is 60 centimeters high. When the marble comes to the end of each ramp, it collides with and pushes a 0.1 kilogram weight along the track.
